pageContext.claim: “Catch and Release is an obsolete term. It is now Catch and Detain. Illegal Immigrants trying to come into the U.S.A., often proudly flying the flag of their nation as they ask for U.S. Asylum, will be detained or turned away. Dems must approve Border Security & Wall NOW!”
pageContext.analysis: This is a misleading tweet. Trump says that asylum seekers are being detained and cannot be released but some are released after a brief period in detention.
